summary: This document is a Sprint Corporate Security response to a grand jury subpoena (Case #2019R01059) from the U.S. Attorney's Office in New York, dated August 13, 2019. It includes subscriber information for a phone number belonging to Michael Thomas, call detail records (CDRs) for that number from July 6 to August 13, 2019, and extensive technical guides explaining Sprint's CDMA call detail reports, network elements, and data formats. The response includes a declaration of records custodian by Steven Hayes.

persons.name: Steven Hayes
persons.context: Sprint Corporate Security employee who signed the declaration of custodian of records and the cover letters responding to the grand jury subpoena.

persons.name: Nicolas Roos
persons.context: Signed the grand jury subpoena dated August 13, 2019, to which this Sprint response is directed.

persons.name: Michael Thomas
persons.context: Individual associated with the subscriber information provided in response to the subpoena. The account was established in 2003 with a billing address in Newark, NJ.

connections.description: Hayes, as Sprint's custodian of records, is responding to a grand jury subpoena signed by AUSA Roos.
Hayes, on behalf of Sprint, is providing subscriber and call records for an account associated with Michael Thomas in response to a legal demand.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued
events.description: A grand jury subpoena was signed by Assistant United States Attorney Nicolas Roos, requesting records from Sprint.

events.title: Sprint Subpoena Response
events.description: Sprint Corporate Security, via Steven Hayes, responded to the subpoena with subscriber information, call detail records, and a custodian declaration.

events.title: Call Detail Record Period
events.description: The period for which call detail records (CDRs) were produced in response to the subpoena, covering over a month of call activity.

locations: 6480 Sprint Parkway, Overland Park, KS 66251 (Sprint Corporate Headquarters)
One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007 (United States Attorney's Office)
Newark, NJ 07103 (Billing address for account holder Michael Thomas)
keyFacts: Sprint received a grand jury subpoena from the U.S. Attorney's Office in New York (Case #2019R01059) requesting CDRs, subscriber info, and payment info for a specific phone number.
The subscriber information identifies the account holder as Michael Thomas, with an account established on February 15, 2003, and a billing address in Newark, NJ.
Sprint's response includes detailed call records for the number from July 6, 2019, to August 13, 2019, showing hundreds of calls and texts.
The document includes a formal declaration by Sprint custodian Steven Hayes, certifying the records for use as evidence under Federal Rules of Evidence 902(11) and 803(6).
Sprint notes that the target phone number was found to be currently serviced by Cingular, and payment records were not provided due to internal PCI data standards.
